testcase.classname: Get a loan Quotation on Zopa site
testcase.name: Navigate to the Loan page
testcase.system-out: Given borrower is on Home Page..............................................passed When borrower select 'Get a zopa loan'......................................passed Then loans page is displayed................................................passed

testcase.classname: Get a loan Quotation on Zopa site
testcase.name: Navigate to Loan Quotation page for personlised rates
testcase.system-out: Given borrower is on Home Page..............................................passed When borrower select 'Get a zopa loan'......................................passed And borrower select 'Get my personlised rates'..............................passed Then loan sign up page is displayed.........................................passed

testcase.classname: Get a loan Quotation on Zopa site
testcase.name: Navigate to Loan Quotation page and complete application with valid Data
testcase.system-out: Given borrower is on Home Page..............................................passed When borrower select 'Get a zopa loan'......................................passed And borrower select 'Get my personlised rates'..............................passed And borrower enters valid details...........................................passed

testcase.classname: Get a loan Quotation on Zopa site
testcase.name: Navigate to Loan Quotation page and complete application with invalid Data
testcase.system-out: Given borrower is on Home Page..............................................passed When borrower select 'Get a zopa loan'......................................passed And borrower select 'Get my personlised rates'..............................passed And borrower enters invalidDetails..........................................passed Then warning message box with relevant messages is shown....................passed
